sn35.97:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you who lives negligently and who lives diligently.
sn35.97:1.3: And how does someone live negligently?
sn35.97:1.4: When you live with the eye faculty unrestrained, your mind becomes polluted when it comes to sights known by the eye.
sn35.97:1.5: When the mind is polluted, there’s no joy.
sn35.97:1.6: When there’s no joy, there’s no rapture.
sn35.97:1.7: When there’s no rapture, there’s no tranquility.
sn35.97:1.8: When there’s no tranquility, there’s suffering.
sn35.97:1.9: When one is suffering, the mind does not become immersed in samādhi.
sn35.97:1.10: When the mind is not immersed in samādhi, principles do not become clear.
sn35.97:1.11: Because principles have not become clear, you’re considered to live negligently.
sn35.97:1.12: When you live with the ear … nose … tongue … body …
sn35.97:1.15: mind faculty unrestrained, your mind becomes polluted when it comes to thoughts known by the mind.
sn35.97:1.16: When the mind is polluted, there’s no joy.
sn35.97:1.17: When there’s no joy, there’s no rapture.
sn35.97:1.18: When there’s no rapture, there’s no tranquility.
sn35.97:1.19: When there’s no tranquility, there’s suffering.
sn35.97:1.20: When one is suffering, the mind does not become immersed in samādhi.
sn35.97:1.21: When the mind is not immersed in samādhi, principles do not become clear.
sn35.97:1.22: Because principles have not become clear, you’re considered to live negligently.
sn35.97:2.1: And how does someone live diligently?
sn35.97:2.2: When you live with the eye faculty restrained, your mind doesn’t become polluted when it comes to sights known by the eye.
sn35.97:2.3: When the mind isn’t polluted, joy springs up.
sn35.97:2.5: When the mind is full of rapture, the body becomes tranquil.
sn35.97:2.6: When the body is tranquil, one feels bliss.
sn35.97:2.7: And when blissful, the mind becomes immersed in samādhi.
sn35.97:2.8: When the mind is immersed in samādhi, principles become clear.
sn35.97:2.9: Because principles have become clear, you’re considered to live diligently.
sn35.97:2.10: When you live with the ear … nose … tongue … body …
